quickSwitch.title: Quick switch
quickSwitch.description: Feel free to change to another page through here!

portfolio-v2.metaDescription: Shoonkey's portfolio: Intro, projects and contact info

pomodoro-timer.name: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro-timer.imgAlt: Screenshot of Pomodoro timer app: a 20-minute timer besides a todo list
pomodoro-timer.metaDescription: A minimalistic Pomodoro timer app where you can manage your tasks and pauses

flash-cards.name: Flash cards
flash-cards.imgAlt: Screenshot of the flash card app: there's a card centered and two cards barely appearing on either side of the screen
flash-cards.metaDescription: A flash card app built to help study and memorize cool stuff

music-theory-study.name: Music theory study
music-theory-study.imgAlt: Screenshot of one of the quizzes, showing a musical staff with a treble clef and 4/4 time signature, asking to place where the note E (mi) is
music-theory-study.metaDescription: An app composed (pun intended) of information and quizzes on music theory

puban-website.name: Puban cipher (website)
puban-website.imgAlt: Screenshot of homepage of the website for Puban, showing Puban written in a gradient from lightblue to purple above two textboxes for translation
puban-website.metaDescription: Puban is a made-up cipher that uses Ubbi Dubbi and PigLatin to encrypt messages

puban-bot.name: Puban cipher (Discord bot)
puban-bot.imgAlt: Screenshot of bot setup page for the Puban Discord bot, showing Puban written in a gradient from lightblue to purple, followed a bunch of by instructions
puban-bot.metaDescription: Set up the Discord bot that encrypts and decrypts Puban, a made-up cipher

home.briefIntroduction: I'm a <0>software developer</0> with around 3 years of experience. I've worked with Node, React, Vue and Express.
home.introduction: <0>I started learning programming around 2013, learning Javascript with ProcessingJS (a graphics library), and basic C for competitive programming. Since then Iâ€™ve moved mainly to C++ in competitive programming, and Typescript with Node and React for web development.</0><1>I am passionate about development because I like learning and creating new things. Translating ideas to a crazy fast logic-powered machine and seeing it understand me? WHAT. SIGN ME UP!!</1>

noResults.asciiArt: ASCII art of a face with a monocle

contact.title:
Here are some ways to contact me
on the interwebs!

email.couldGoLike:
It could go like
"<0>Hey there! Your portfolio design looks rad, good job!"
email.idBeLike:
I'd be like
"<0>Oh, thanks. I'm glad you like it! I'm pretty proud of it myself."

github.findMe: You can find a lot of my code on
github.text: <0>Open-source is an awesome thing and I want to contribute to it more! Where does one get the confidence for that though...?</0><1>I swear I'mma try.</1>

linkedIn.text: I post there about projects in the making, coding problem suggestions and other work stuff!

codingPlatforms.title: Coding platforms
codingPlatforms.text: I like practicing programming around the internet! I've started my journey in Beecrowd (when it was still URI Online Judge!) and usually am on Beecrowd, LeetCode or HackerRank these days!
